title: Propulsion Assignment
description: Analyze propulsion systems and discuss their application in modern rocketry.

title: Combustion Analysis
description: Conduct combustion analysis for various rocket propellants and document findings.

title: Nozzle Design Project
description: Design a rocket nozzle and justify choices based on performance metrics.

title: Aerodynamics Quiz
description: Quiz on fundamental aerodynamic principles and their application in flight.

title: Flow Analysis
description: Analyze fluid flow through various aerospace structures and report findings.

title: Heating Analysis
description: Perform thermal analysis on aerospace components under varying heat conditions.

title: Structural Design Task
description: Design and analyze structural components for spacecraft load-bearing systems.

title: Orbital Calculations
description: Calculate orbital parameters and transfer maneuvers for space missions.

title: Systems Engineering Exam
description: Final exam on systems engineering practices and spacecraft design integration.
